metadata.Title: CVE-2023-38288 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Not a Security Issue.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-38288` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.5.0-5ubuntu1.1
libtiff-tools - 4.5.0-5ubuntu1.1
libtiff6 - 4.5.0-5ubuntu1.1
libtiffxx6 - 4.5.0-5ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> as of 2023-08-24, it appears this CVE has now been rejected for some reason, need to investigate

criterions.comment: tiff package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.5.0-5ubuntu1.1').
